name: Beaver
news: For the first time in 400 years, beavers are breeding in Shropshire.

name: Hedgehog
news: Very spikey hedgehog seen crossing the road at an alarmingly fast speed.

name: Badger
news: Last Week we welcomed our first baby badger since we rescued a male and female 12 months ago

name: Mole
news: We recently uncovered a half complete escape tunnle dug by the moles themselves. Who knows what would have happened if they managed to escape. We aren't ready to say goodbye to them.
